item.title: How to write to a CSV (Excel) file in C
item.description: Writing to a CSV using C code A basic CSV file relies on a comma-separated data format, which makes it straightforward to write to this file type from a c program. First you will want to create a file pointer, which will be used to access and write to a file. Then we call fopen on this file pointer, passing in the name of the file we want to write to.
